mapper.select:
select * from (select * from (select notice_num,subject,writer,to_char(writedate,'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from notice
order by notice_num desc) where rownum<=(${nowPage}*${onePageRecord})order by notice_num asc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecordCount} order by notice_num desc
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%' order by notice_num desc) where rownum<=(${nowPage}*${onePageRecord})order by notice_num asc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecordCount} order by notice_num desc
select notice_num, subject, content, writer, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate from notice where notice_num=${param1}

select count(notice_num) from notice
where ${searchKey} like '%${searchWord}%'
select event_num, subject, to_char(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate, to_char(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate, event_img from event where enddate>=sysdate order by enddate
select event_num, subject, to_char(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate, to_char(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate, event_img from event where enddate < sysdate order by enddate desc
select subject, to_char(startdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') startdate, to_char(enddate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enddate, to_char(writedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') writedate, content from event where event_num=${param1}
